gurmukhi: ਧਸੀ ਭੂਮ ਬੇਧੰ ਰਹੀ ਹ੍ਵੈ ਪਤਾਰੰ
translation: They earth went deep into the nether-world;

gurmukhi: ਧਰਯੋ ਬਿਸਨ ਤੳੁ ਦਾੜ ਗਾੜਾ ਵਤਾਰੰ ॥
transliteration: Ddaryo Bisan Tau Daad Gadraa Vataaran||
translation: Then Vishnu manifested himself in the form of a Boar of terrible and cruel teeth.

gurmukhi: ਧਸਯੋ ਨੀਰ ਮੱਧੰ ਕੀਯੋ ੳੂਚ ਨਾਦੰ ॥
transliteration: Dhasyo Neer Maddhan Keeyo Ooch Naadan||
translation: He penetrated into water and raised a thunderous shout,
Which spread equally throughout the universe.4.

gurmukhi: ਬਜੇ ਡਾਕ ਡੳੁਰੂ ਦੋੳੂ ਬੀਰ ਜਾਗੇ ॥
transliteration: Bade Daak Dauroo Dooo Beer Jaage||
translation: Hearing this terrible shout and the resounding of the trumpets, both the brave demons awakened;

gurmukhi: ਸੁਣੇ ਨਾਦਿ ਬੰਕੇ ਮਹਾਂ ਭੀਰ ਭਾਗੇ ॥
transliteration: Soune Naadh Banke Mahaan Bheer Bhaage||
translation: Listening to their thundering voice, the cowards ran away;
The war began and the clattering of the glistening swords and the sound of the furious blows was heard;
The luster of the swords looked like the flash of lightning in the month of Bhadon.5.

gurmukhi: ਮੁਖੰ ਮੁੱਛ ਬੰਕੀ ਬਕੈ ਸੂਰਬੀਰੰ ॥ ਤੜੰਕਾਰ ਤੇਗੰ ਸੜੰਕਾਰ ਤੀਰੰ ॥
transliteration: Moukhanndmouchchh Bankibakaisoorbderan|| Tadankaar Tegadg Sadankaar Tderan||
translation: The warriors of winsome whiskers are shouting and the sounds of the blows of the swords and arrows are being heard;

gurmukhi: ਧਮੱਕਾਰ ਸਾਗੰ ਖੜੱਕਾਰ ਖੱਗੰ ॥ ਟੁਟੇ ਟੂਕ ਟੋਪੰ ੳੁਠੇ ਨਾਲ ਅੱਗੰ ॥੬॥
transliteration: Dhamakkaar Saagadg Khadakkaar Khadganng|| Toute Took Topan Outhe Naal Aggadg||6||
translation: With the knocking and falling and the sparks are coming out from them.6.

gurmukhi: ੳੁਠੇ ਨੱਦ ਨਾਦੰ ਢਮੱਕਾਰ ਢੋਲੰ ॥ ਢਲੰਕਾਰ ਢਾਲੰ ਮੁਖੰ ਮਾਰ ਬੋਲੰ ॥
transliteration: Oothe Nadd Naadan Dhamakkaar Dholan|| Dhalankaar Dhaalan Moukhanndmaar Bolan||
translation: With the resounding of trumpets and knocking sound on the shields, the utterance of “kill kill” coming from the mouth is being heard;
